title: Ophth Hypertonic 10ML Eye Drops
details: Hypertonic sodium chloride eye ointment and eye drops are used to draw water out of a swollen cornea.
precautions: Do not use any other eye drops without doctor suggestion. Do not use solution if changes color or becomes cloudy. If your condition persists or worsens, or if you think you may have a serious medical problem, seek immediate medical attention. It can interact with other topicals or eye drops so use with caution.
effects: It can cause irritation, burning, itchiness etc

title: Fml Eye 5ML Eye Drops
details:
FML eye drops are commonly prescribed by eye surgeons to patients who have just gone through eye surgery for the treatment of inflammation, eye swelling, soreness, redness, any eye injury and for the prevention of eye pressure.Â 

FML ey

READ MORE
precautions: Patients are always suggested to take some precautionary measures before using the fml eye drops to avoid having side effects. It is suggested for women to share their complete medical history with their doctors while they are having pregnancy because this drug, fluorometholone is said to be fatal for fetuses and women should avoid using this fml eye drop while pregnancy breastfeeding unless doctors prescribed use so.Moreover, it is highly suggested and recommended to keep fml eye drops out of the reach of children and must be stored at room temperature away from extreme temperatures.Doctors recommended the patients use the fml eye drops for a maximum of four weeks once the fml eye drop bottle has been opened and used as a safety precaution.After this certain time, there are chances of developing eye infections. Always consult a doctor if you experience to have abnormalities and symptoms contradicting a normal routine.People who are allergic to eye drops and drugs are preferred to not use fml eye drops as they may contain some preservatives that can trigger allergic reactions. If you are noticing some eye rash or sort of swelling, you may always tell your doctor immediately without waiting for days to pass.
effects: Some serious side effects can be experienced by the use of fml eye drops. Some of the side effects associated with fluorometholone are as follows:Severe eye allergyburning in the yeitchy eyesIncreased eye pressure can lead to vision problems and cataractsBlurred visionDry mouthSkin rashes and rednessSwollen eyelidsChanges in appetitePatients are prescribed to tell their doctors if they experience any of the above side effects to avoid causing fatal eye diseases.

title: Pred Forte Eye Drops
details: This medication is used to treat certain eye conditions due to inflammation or injury.
precautions: If your doctor does approve the wearing of contact lenses during treatment with this medication, remove the lenses before using the eye drops. The preservative in this product may be absorbed by contact lenses. Wait at least 15 minutes after each dose of the eye drop before wearing the lenses again. Before using this medication, tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Eye infections, Recent eye surgery, Cataracts, Glaucoma (open-angle type), Myopia, Diabetes.
effects: Rarely, Stinging/Burning of the eyes for 1 to 2 minutes may occur when you apply this medication.

title: Histazolin 5ML Eye Drops
details: It is used to help relieve and prevent seasonal allergy eye symptoms such as itching, tearing, and redness.
precautions: Do not instill a double dose to make up for a missed one. Do not stop using this medication without consulting your doctor or pharmacist. To avoid contamination of the bottle tip, replace the cap after each use and do not touch the eye, finger, or other surface with the bottle tip. Wash your hands thoroughly before and after using the drops. Ask your pharmacist or healthcare provider before using any medicine.
effects: Blurred vision, tingling, stinging

title: Nafamine 15ML Eye Drops
details: This combination is used to treat Inflammation, Injury, Congestion.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially of Eye infections, Recent eye surgery, Cataracts, Glaucoma (open-angle type), Myopia, Diabetes.
effects: Widened pupils, Stinging/burning, Widened pupils of the eyes for 1 to 2 minutes and temporary blurred vision may occur when you applied. Serious Side effects are Glaucoma, Cataract.

title: Curine 15ML Eye Drops
details:
Curine eye drops are prescribed medicine. Curine eye drops are composed of Naphazoline. Its primary purpose is to get relief from an eye allergy. This medicine belongs to the medicine category known as non-specific anti-conjunctivitis preps.

< READ MORE
precautions: Curine eye drops precautions are listed below.Before taking this medicine, inform the doctor about your past medical history related to the eyes and skin. Also, inform the doctor if you are taking any supplements.Before using this medicine, inform the doctor if you are allergic to any of the ingredients used in this medicine. This medicine contains some inactive ingredients that can cause allergic reactions.The patients suffering from heart disease, diabetes, high blood pressure, and difficulty in urination should consult the doctor before initiating the course of this medication.Check the expiry date of the medicine before using it. Otherwise, an expired medicine can cause adverse side effects.Keep the medicine away from children's use.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history, especially of Eye infections, Recent eye surgery, Cataracts, Glaucoma (open-angle type), Myopia, Diabetes.
effects: The Curine eye drops side effects are described below.The common side effects of Curine eye drops include stinging, dryness in the nose, runny and fizzy nose.It can cause burning of eyes and sneezing.The serious side effects of Curine eye drops include irregular heartbeat, such as at some time it may be fast, or slow, or it can be pounding.It can also cause hypersensitive problems such as nausea, vomiting, headache, unusual sweating, etc. It can also cause trouble in sleeping, weakness, change in mood swings that may cause behavioral changes.It can cause serious allergic reactions such as skin allergy or eye allergy, skin rashes, itching, etc., but these cases are very rare.It can cause dizziness, drowsiness, and swelling around the eyes.The above list may be not containing all the side effects of Curine eye drops. Therefore, to know more about this medication, consult any pharmacist. If any of the side effects persist, then immediately consult the doctor, or seek clinical help.Widened pupils, Stinging/burning, Widened pupils of the eyes for 1 to 2 minutes and temporary blurred vision may occur when you applied. Serious Side effects are Glaucoma, Cataract.

title: Tears Eye 15ML Gel
details: It is used for the treatment of dry eyes.
precautions: Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. If you have any health problems, consult your doctor or pharmacist before using this product. If you are also using another kind of eye medication (e.g., drops or ointments), wait at least 5 minutes before applying other medications. Use eye drops before eye ointments to allow the eye drops to enter the eye. Ask your physician or pharmacist before taken another medicine. This product (especially ointments) may temporarily cause blurred vision right after being placed in the eye(s).
effects: Vision may be temporarily blurred when this product is first used. Also, minor burning/stinging/irritation may temporarily occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Poly Tears Drops
formula:
Polyethylene glycol and Propylene glycol
General
details: This medication is used to relieve dry, irritated eyes.
precautions: Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. This product (especially ointments) may temporarily cause blurred vision right after being placed in the eye(s). Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear visionuntil you are sure you can perform such activities safely. If you wear contact lenses, remove them before using most kinds of eye lubricants. Ask your doctor or pharmacist when you may replace your contact lenses. There are a few types of eye lubricants (some that contain polysorbates) that can be used while wearing contact lenses. Check the package to see if you can wear your contact lenses while using your product. If you are also using another kind of eye medication (e.g., drops or ointments), wait at least 5 minutes before applying other medications. Use eye drops before eye ointments to allow the eye drops to enter the eye. Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist of all prescription and nonprescription/herbal products you may use, especially of other eye medications.
effects: Vision may be temporarily blurred when this product is first used. Also, minor burning/stinging/irritation may temporarily occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you wear contact lenses. Your vision may be temporarily blurred or unstable after applying this drug. Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear vision until you are sure you can perform such activities safely.
effects: Headache, Blurred vision, Burning/Stinging/Redness/Dryness of the eye, Eyelid swelling, or a Feeling as if something is in your eye may occur.

title: Olonase 15ML Nasal Spray
details: This medication is used to treat Itching and Redness in the eyes due to allergies.
precautions: Tell your doctor/Pharmacist if you wear contact lenses. Your vision may be temporarily blurred or unstable after applying this drug. Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear vision until you are sure you can perform such activities safely.
effects: Headache, Blurred vision, Burning/Stinging/Redness/Dryness of the eye, Eyelid swelling, or a Feeling as if something is in your eye may occur.

title: Emadine Eye Drops
details: It is used to treat itchy or watery eyes caused by allergies
precautions: Before using emedastine, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients (such as preservatives like benzalkonium chloride), which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. This drug may cause temporary blurred or unstable vision after you apply it. Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear vision until you are sure you can perform such activities safely. Ask your doctor or pharmacist before using any medicine.
effects: It can cause mild stinging and burning in eyes.

title: Systane 30ML Drops
formula:
Polyethylene Glycol and Propylene Glycol
Alcon
details:
Systane eye drops are used to provide relief from irritated and dry eyes. Oftentimes people face the problem of irritated and dry eyes during summertime and in windy weather. Dry eyes can also happen because of the air conditioner or by the exces

READ MORE
precautions: It is always better to read the leaflet before using the medication. This habit reduces the risk of many fatal consequences.People with eye infections and allergies should consult the doctor before using the medication.Do not use the eye drops after a month of opening the seal.Systane eye drops are not considered safe to treat eye infections.Immediately rinse the eyes with cold water if the eye drops give you an extremely irritated and burning sensation.Do not go under the sun after adding drops in the eyes.Do not put drops in the eyes while wearing contact lenses.It is considered safe to be used by pregnant women and breastfeeding mothers.It can be used to treat acute infections but on the doctor's advice only.Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. This product (especially ointments) may temporarily cause blurred vision right after being placed in the eye(s). Do not drive, use machinery, or do any activity that requires clear visionuntil you are sure you can perform such activities safely. If you wear contact lenses, remove them before using most kinds of eye lubricants. Ask your doctor or pharmacist when you may replace your contact lenses. There are a few types of eye lubricants (some that contain polysorbates) that can be used while wearing contact lenses. Check the package to see if you can wear your contact lenses while using your product. If you are also using another kind of eye medication (e.g., drops or ointments), wait at least 5 minutes before applying other medications. Use eye drops before eye ointments to allow the eye drops to enter the eye. Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist of all prescription and nonprescription/herbal products you may use, especially of other eye medications.
effects: Likewise, in every other medicine, Systane eye drops have some side effects as well. Most of the individuals have not reported any complaint regarding the drops; only a few individuals with sensitivities experience any kind of side-effect or discomfort. Some of the side-effects that are most likely to be experienced by people with sensitivities are as follows:Extreme eye irritation and discomfort.Redness in the eyes and nose congestionSticky eyelashes due to the presence of some inactive ingredient present in the eye drops.Swelling of eyes and face or teary eyesIrritable Bowel syndrome such as diarrhoea followed by stomach cramping.If any of the side effects persist or worsens, stop using the drops and immediately seek medical assistance. It is always better to check the ingredients of the eye drops before using them to avoid taking any kind of risk for such a sensitive organ.Â Vision may be temporarily blurred when this product is first used. Also, minor burning/stinging/irritation may temporarily occur. If any of these effects persist or worsen, tell your doctor or pharmacist promptly.

title: Artelac Nighttime Gel
formula:
Carbomer, Cetrimide, Sorbitol, Sodium Hydroxide
Boush&Lomb
details: Artelac Nighttime Gel Is An Eye Gel With A Combination Of Agents Designed For People With Dry Eyes (Chronic Tear Dysfunction). It Provides Added Protection From Persistently Irritated, Dry, Gritty, Painful Eyes By Calming And Relieving Symptoms.
precautions: Please Read The Included Leaflet Carefully Before Using This Product
effects: Irritation Of The Eye.Blurred Vision After Application.Temporary Burning Or Sticky Sensation In The Eye

title: Cationorm 10ML Eye Drops
details: These eye drops are also known as 'artificial tears'. They are used to relieve eye dryness and soreness.
precautions: Before using this product, tell your doctor or pharmacist if you are allergic to it; or if you have any other allergies. This product may contain inactive ingredients, which can cause allergic reactions or other problems. Talk to your pharmacist for more details. Do not use unless the solution is clear and seal is intact. If you are also using another kind of eye medication (e.g., drops or ointments), wait at least 5 minutes before applying other medications. Use eye drops before eye ointments to allow the eye drops to enter the eye. It can interact with other topicals or eye drops so use with caution.
effects: It can cause erythema, swelling, tenderness, nausea, arthalgia, headache
